name: 10 Torches
description:
You only have 10 torches to light the way and distract an onslaught of venomous spiders. Use the arrow keys to walk and spacebar to light a torch. Throw the torch by pressing spacebar again. Torches attract spiders.

Art and music licensed from canarigames.itch.io, iknowkingrabbit.itch.io, wenrexa.itch.io, pixel-poem.itch.io, and elthen.itch.io.
